alert.note: Alert for Monroe Upper Keys (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Key West (Key West - The Florida Keys)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 16 at 5:31AM EDT by NWS Key West
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Upper Keys in Monroe County through 600 AM EDT... At 530 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Windley Key, or 12 miles northeast of East End Of Channel 5 Bridge, moving east at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds near 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Plantation, Upper Matecumbe Key, Teatable Key, Windley Key, Lower Matecumbe Key and Islamorada. This includes US 1 between mile markers 78 and 93. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
